rules_text:
[i](As this enters, insert it into one of your three programs. At your first main phase each turn, the next program runs all its Subroutines.)[/i]
Whenever this Subroutine runs, creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. Target creature you control gains first strike until end of turn.
